content: Summarize this text:  10 informal ways to say yes and no. No way.

Sure, here are ten informal ways to say yes and no: Yes: 1. Sure thing! 2. Definitely! 3. Absolutely! 4. Of course! 5. You bet! 6. I'll be there! 7. Count me in! 8. I'm game! 9. Let's do it! 10. Sounds good to me. No: 1. No way! 2. Not a chance! 3. Never gonna happen! 4. Nope, not at all! 5. Uh-uh, nope! 6. I don't think so! 7. Nope, not for me! 8. I'm sorry, but no. 9. Nope, not interested! 10. I'm afraid that's a no.
